cookingTips: Pat chicken dry with paper towels before breading so coating adheres properly
Dip in beaten egg, then coat evenly in bread crumbs, pressing gently so they stick
Spray tenderloins lightly with oil before air-frying to promote browning and crispness at 380°F for 12-15 minutes
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook on proper breading technique and air-fryer temperature to achieve a crispy, golden coating with tender, juicy chicken inside.
